meanings.definition: A small brightly colored fish found in tropical waters.
meanings.sent1: The damselfishes swam gracefully among the coral reefs.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of damselfishes while snorkeling in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The damselfishes decided to have a colorful fashion show underwater.
meanings.sent4: The damselfishes shimmered like jewels in the clear blue water.
meanings.sent5: The children were mesmerized by the vibrant hues of the damselfishes.
